author: cms-sw
body:
Additional changes :

* PR Unit test job (https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/ib-run-pr-unittests) - add `GPU_FLAVOR` parameter, select node based on it.

* PR Relval job (https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/ib-run-pr-relvals/) - select node based on `TEST_FLAVOR`

* Monitoring job (https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/jenkins-monitor-queue/) needs to be changed - kill pr test jobs that are stuck due to lumi node being offline
title: Run PR gpu utests/relvals on both CUDA and ROCm GPUs
